network_create_socket_ext: This function is used to create a new client socket for your game to communicate over the network. You must define the socket protocol (see the list of constants below) and give a port to use, and the function will return a unique id which should be used in all further function calls for that socket, or a value of less than 0 if the connection fails.
Create a web socket (only for projects running on HTML5), using TCP.
The above code will create a new UDP socket on port 6510.
